mapper.select: SELECT r.day FROM restrequest r INNER JOIN givelessons g ON r.`staffId`=g.`staffId` WHERE g.`classId`=#{classId}

select r.restId,s.staffName,r.nowdate,r.restdate,r.requestStatus,(CASE WHEN r.requestStatus=0 THEN '已通过' WHEN r.requestStatus=1 THEN '未通过' WHEN r.requestStatus=2 THEN '待处理' END) formatStatus,r.day,r.reason from restrequest r inner join staff s on r.staffId=s.staffId order by r.requestStatus desc
